content: the camellia mandala top is a made-to-measure top featuring a beautiful mandala detail worked in one piece the pattern begins with the mandala and adds a body section as long as you prefer for a cropped or full length top the corset style back and variability of the design makes this pattern size-inclusive according to your measurements and preferences dk yarn is preferred for this pattern 1-2 skeins depending on desired size but worsted weight yarn works for the pattern with some modifications as discussed in the video
